snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio gained a high-profile partner in Cardinal Timothy M. Dolan as he raced to find classroom space in New York City for 24,000 4-year-olds by the fall.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio and Cardinal Timothy M Dolan join forces to announce they will work together to provide more prekindergarten classes in the city, mayor’s signature issue; de Blasio gains a high-profile partner as he races to find classroom space for 24,000 4-year-olds by fall; Cardinal Dolan emerges with a powerful ally at a time when the church is working to rejuvenate Catholic schools.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio gained a high-profile partner in Cardinal Timothy M. Dolan as he raced to find classroom space in New York City for 24,000 4-year-olds by the fall.

headline.main: De Blasio and Dolan Announce a Push for More Pre-K Classes
headline.print_headline: De Blasio and Dolan Announce a Push for More Prekindergarten Classes
